targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory_usage_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["namespace"] == "drycc")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "namespace", "_value"])
  |> movingAverage(n: 10)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage_nanocores")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["namespace"] == "drycc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "drycc-controller")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "container_name", "_value"])
  |> movingAverage(n: 10)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: r._value / 1000000.0
    })
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "drycc-controller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory_usage_bytes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
